install.require: Your graphics adapter is not supported by this driver. Installation will not proceed.

A previous install of the fglrx driver has been detected. Please uninstall the older version before installing this version. Optionally, run the installer with --force option to overwrite the existing driver. Forcing install is not recommended. See /usr/share/ati/fglrx-install.log for more details.

Please install the required pre-requisites before proceeding with AMD Proprietary Driver installation. Install the required pre-requisites before installing the fglrx driver. Optionally, run the installer with --force option to install without the tools. Forcing install will disable AMD hardware acceleration and may make your system unstable. Not recommended. Please check file /usr/share/ati/fglrx-install.log for more details.
install.post_install_msg: There were errors during installation. Details can be found in /usr/share/ati/fglrx-install.log
